analysis.description:
SAXO.claimTokensToOwner (/unique_chucks/10/0x5398dbc256fcd5128d92c32919f1da0885777ea3.sol#416-426) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/10/0x5398dbc256fcd5128d92c32919f1da0885777ea3.sol#424-426)

ERC223Token.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/10/0x5398dbc256fcd5128d92c32919f1da0885777ea3.sol#133-158)
	- /unique_chucks/10/0x5398dbc256fcd5128d92c32919f1da0885777ea3.sol#141-146

ERC223Token.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/10/0x5398dbc256fcd5128d92c32919f1da0885777ea3.sol#101-124)
